vote.text: Amendment SA 1437 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1437 proposed by Senator Perdue for Senator Schatz. (consideration: CR S3250; text: CR S3250) To amend the preamble.

Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1437 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
